WorkItem.Description:
"Mangle Ability" is being labeled as "Spell Hit" on various Idols and there for not being calculated properly.
Lots of items in the Idol Category are missing information and not being calculated properly.

Comments.Message: This is really vague. Please provide more detail about what your issue actually is.

Idol of Perspicacious Attacks is a Druid idol, but it has no stats listed in the Rawr DB. It adds 120 DPS to Maul and 24 to Swipe, sounds like a good Tanking piece, but it is not even in the list. Also a lot of idols have no stats for them as well. Relentless Gladiator's Idol of Resolve show that it only activates when you use a spell, but it actually activates when you use Maul. A nice threat piece, but again not included in the calculations because Tanks do not use Spells. There needs to be a Maul Ability setting in Rawr for these calculations.

Ah, basically support for all the bad idols. No, none of those are remotely good compared to Corruptor, or Mutilation. But yeah, we should support them, and I'll try to get to that, but it's really a low priority.
